text:
I see...! That's good.
Then, the stage will surely be just as you imagined.

Yes, definitely...
A warm... and very gentle stage...
Ah, a stage where everyone stands together.

From now on too,
what Kiriko imagines will continue to take shape.

Yeah, I'd be happy if you could imagine a lot and tell me.
Because I want to help bring it to life too.

Producer-san too...
is warm and very kind...
